Commands.Cover: Target: 3 turns Cover (single-target attacks hit self in place of covered ally)  Self: 3 turns ATK Up I  Mastery with 1 use
Commands.Cover+: Allies: 5 turns Cover.  Self: 5 turns ATK Up I.  Take single-target attacks in place of covered allies
Commands.Blade Block: Self: 2 turns Dodge Up III, DEF Up I  Mastery with 1 use
Commands.Blade Block+: Self: 5 turns Dodge Up V & DEF Up I.  Dodging a physical attack triggers a counterattack

Passives.Kill BRV Gain: Grants a small amount of BRV after killing an enemy.
Passives.Master Guard Up: Slightly raises Defense after mastering an ability.
Passives.Spirit of Competition: Grants 100% critical hit rate when BRV equals or exceeds Initial BRV and target's BRV is over twice of that BRV.
Passives.Danger Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack when HP is under 20%.
Passives.Cover Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using Cover.
Passives.HP Damage Guard: Slightly raises Defense after taking HP damage.
Passives.Blade Block Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack for 1 turn after using Blade Block.
Passives.BRV Live: Prevents Break status if BRV is over 50%.BRV value remains at 1.
Passives.A Grandfather's Lifestyle: Prevents KO if HP is over 50% and leaves its value at 1.
Passives.Buff Boost Speed: Largely raises MAX BRV, moderately raises SPD with active buffs
Passives.Cover Extension: Cover use count +2When using Cover, Cover+:   Slight Cover status effect boost   Allies: 5 turns MAX BRV Up II   Grants party BRV based on own MAX BRVAfter using Cover, Cover+:    HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (melee BRV attack + HP attack) for 5 turns
Passives.All Mastery Attack: Slightly raises party's ATK upon ability mastery
Passives.Blade Block Extension: When using Blade Block, Blade Block+:   Increases BRV based on ATK, then BRV   2.0 + HP attackWhile Dodge from Blade Block+ active:   Triggers additional HP attack after CounterWhen using BRV Attack, BRV Attack+:   Slight damage boost

Weapons.Defender CP: 35: Increases Blade Block's max uses by 1.Turns BRV Attack to BRV Attack+ after Evasion rate Up is granted.Extends the duration of Evasion Rate Up and Defense Up and increases the potency of Defense Up.Grants Medium Max BRV Up for 6 turns.Increases Counter's potency.
Weapons.Flametongue CP: 15: Raises BRV by 1/2 of Initial BRV after using Cover.Raises it by the full value when the ability is mastered.
